title: Christmas cartoon
brief_description: A “real life” family celebrating Christmas, show their children a film “Toyland”, a Paul Terry Toon cartoon presented by Castle films, showing all the children’s favourite characters and Father Christmas distributing Christmas presents. Ends up with the “real life” family singing and wishing you, the audience, a Merry Christmas to all.
